Comment: It’s all pointless anyway, the tariffs are going to be blocked by a court, probably next week after the hearing on Tuesday. Trump was just pushing for the meeting this weekend to try to get a concession from China before the court case, so he could show something for it. I have no doubt Trump asked for it for this reason. China has absolutely no reason to make any concessions considering this is likely to just disappear entirely when it’s ruled that he can’t actually do this unilaterally
